content: अतिक्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Exceeded, surpassed, gone beyond &c.; सोतिक्रांतः श्रवणविषयं <ls>Me. 103</ls>; सुदूरमतिक्रांतः <ls>K. 35</ls> departed, gone; मनोरथ °दर्शना <ls>Māl. 10</ls> beyond the reach even of desire; विचारातिक्रांतः <ls>Mu. 5. 4</ls> past the stage of thought; चक्षुर्विषयातिक्रांतेषु पक्षिषु <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Past, gone by; °कुनृपति <ls>K. 5</ls>, past, former; <ls n="K.">169.</ls> <ls>Pt. 1. 333</ls>, <ls>Pt. 2</ls>, <ls>Bh. 3. 32</ls>; °पार्थिवगुणान् <ls>Mu. 1</ls> former kings. --तं A past thing, a thing of the past, the past; °तं भगवती कथयति <ls>M. 5</ls> your ladyship is speaking of the past; °ते धैर्यमवलंब्यताम् <ls>U. 3</ls>; किं °उपालंभेन <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> ‘let bygones be bygones.’ °योगिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} with the moon in conjunction.
